name: Kenta Takahashi
description: Kenta Takahashi is a third-year student majoring in Computer Science at the University of Tokyo
Kenta is particularly interested in artificial intelligence and machine learning
Currently, Kenta is working on a project to develop an AI-powered chatbot for mental health support
Kenta is taking advanced classes in data structures, algorithms, and neural networks
Kenta lives in a small studio apartment near the university campus
Kenta's best friend, Hiroshi Watanabe, is studying Electrical Engineering, and they often collaborate on interdisciplinary projects
Kenta enjoys Hiroshi Watanabe's practical approach to problem-solving and his enthusiasm for technology
Kenta is an active member of the university's robotics club, where he has developed leadership skills
Kenta still keeps in touch with his high school friends, Yuki Ito and Kenji Nakamura, who are studying at different universities
Kenta's dream is to start his own AI company and contribute to solving global challenges through technology

goals.long_term: Start an AI company and contribute to solving global challenges through technology

mid_term.description: Complete and present the AI-powered chatbot project at the upcoming tech conference
